mapper.select: SELECT ID , MEMBER_ID , PASSWORD , NAME , AGE , PHONE_NUM , EMAIL FROM MEMBER ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT ID , MEMBER_ID , PASSWORD , NAME , AGE , PHONE_NUM , EMAIL , FORMATDATETIME(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS CREATE_DATE , FORMATDATETIME(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
